title: Judge This Logo Please
content:
Hi there-

I know fonts are what seems to be the focus here-  
but do you all ever critique logo  
or website design?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090713040838im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RightThumbLogo_5336.jpg)

Any ideas?

Thanks

T.
author: HDTV.ME

comments.content:
I find the _RightThumb.com_ font very hard to read, and the drop shadow doesn’t help. I get a kind of Rastafarian vibe from the red-yellow-green color scheme, but maybe that’s just me. Or maybe that’s intentional.

Those are just opinions. These are not opinions:

- The lowercase **a** in _Boats and Jets_ is correct.
- Therefore, the capital **I** in _Rides In Cars_ is incorrect. So are the capital **A** and **T** in _And The People_.
- Ellipses consist of _three_ periods with word spaces between them, like this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090713040838im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ellipses_5736.jpg)

I can’t figure out if this is a joke or not...

too much detail  
too illegbile  
too many words  
too many colours  
too many elements

try and think of something that has to do with hitchhiking or another aspect of your concept, and simplify it into one single image  
the hand by itself wouldn’t be awful, not original by any stretch of the imagination, but certainly a lot better than what you have now

We have a forum dedicated to critique, whether it be a logotype or a typeface. You might get more traffic there.

[http://typophile.com/forum/23](http://web.archive.org/web/20090713040838/http:/typophile.com/forum/23 "http://typophile.com/forum/23")
